backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a portfolio update to affected files and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of auto-generated summaries describing all major frontend portfolio components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all portfolio sections and lazy-loading the particle background.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: Animated About Me section describing the author's background and interests including SAL Institute of Technology and Engineering Research.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Achiev: Section listing achievements using FlipCard components in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Animat: Animated counter that increments values when scrolled into view with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Contact section showing email, GitHub, LinkedIn cards and a resume download button.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/FlipCa: Interactive card enabling front/back flipping with animations and accessibility controls.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Renders a portfolio footer with navigation links, contact info, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Displays the hero banner with typing animation, background image, CTAs, and smooth scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Leader: Shows leadership metrics and ambassador roles using cards, counters, and styled sections.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Navbar: Implements a responsive navbar with active-section highlighting and smooth scrolling across page sections.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Partic: Draws animated particle effects on a fullscreen canvas with motion-reduction support.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Interactive project card with expand animation, tech badges, and links to GitHub or demos.
Displays a grid of ProjectCard components inside a section wrapper.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Resear: Renders a research interests grid with animated cards using useInViewOnce. Each card displays an icon, title, and description with hover gradients.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Provides a styled section wrapper with a title and container layout for portfolio sections.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/SkillM: Displays an animated skill bar that fills when scrolled into view. Uses useInViewOnce and supports delayed animation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Renders categorized skill groups with icons and SkillMeters inside a SectionShell. Each group shows animated skill bars.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Exports an array of project metadata including titles, descriptions, technologies, and links/GitHub URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks the currently visible section using IntersectionObserver and returns the active section id.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Provides a ref and boolean that becomes true once the element enters view, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting using a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useTypingText.ts: Animates typing and deleting text cycles unless reduced motion is enabled, updating displayed text over time.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, reduced-motion handling, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theme extensions for colors, fonts, animations, and integrates typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing versions, existing features, and a pending request to add a college name to portfolio content.
